## DatabaseConnection.connect() method

Connects to the database.

**Signature:**

```typescript
connect(username?: string, password?: string, custom?: Map<string, any>): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  username | string | _(Optional)_ The username for the database connection. |
|  password | string | _(Optional)_ The password for the database connection. |
|  custom | Map&lt;string, any&gt; | _(Optional)_ Custom data for the connection. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise that resolves to a boolean indicating the success of the connection.
